Cole_Solomon.bio: Cole is a product designer whom has been designing for over 3 years with skills ranging from Graphic, Illustration, UI/UX, interaction and web design, he is also a mobile developer just like Bruce wayne at Night, he is a glutton for Flutter with Dart. Cole is a passionate community builder, building and contributing to communities such as kwarabuild, gdgilorin, prototypr.io and blacksWhoDesign worldwide.

Nasser_Abdou.bio: Software developer with experience working with Python, JavaScript, Odoo, Flask, and Google Cloud Platform. I have been developing under odoo since 2016 and have worked on several projects ranging from stock management to human resources and payroll, as well as POS and specific customer needs.
